markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />command ([death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** Make a Strike against a living tree with _Blackaxe_. If it hits, the tree withers to ash and you heal 250 Hit Points and gain the benefit of [_restoration_](/Spells.aspx?ID=258) (6th) and [_restore senses_](/Spells.aspx?ID=259).
name: command (death, healing, necromancy)
